text: The mountain takes its toll. Do not linger here: move off the mountain to prevent attrition.

The elements show their true power over deep waters, endlessly buffeting the fleet and bringing death to our mariners. Keep to the coastline to ensure their safety.

Your troops are deserting because you can no longer sustain them. Resolve this crisis before your forces are crippled.
Besieging a settlement also takes its toll on the besiegers, as disease and small skirmishes claim the weak. End this siege, soon to stop this attrition.
